## Polish Fantasy Conventions and Gaming Community

Pyrkon is Poland's biggest fantasy convention, held annually in Poznań and attracting over 55,000 people in 2022, making it one of the biggest in Europe. The convention is dedicated to science fiction and fantasy literature, comics, film, television, video games, RPG, LARP, board games, collectible card games and miniature wargaming.

Pyrkon 2024 took place and featured a video report from the Fantasy Festival. The 2024 event brought together fans of literature, films, music, manga and anime, board games and video games, cosplay and entertainment.

## Gaming and RPG Community

There is a substantial fandom of role-playing gamers in Poland, with the largest role-playing and science fiction conventions being Polcon, Falkon and Pyrkon.

Pyrkon features dedicated sections including Computer Games contests and tournaments, lectures about game design, creating Let's Play content, and RPG sections with lessons on making good role-play sessions and presentations of new RPG systems.

## Cosplay and Social Media Presence

Polish cosplayers are gaining international recognition, with representatives like Kula as Basim from Assassin's Creed Mirage representing Poland in cosplay at the Extreme Cosplay Gathering World Championships 2024.

The Masquerade cosplay competition is one of Pyrkon's highlights, with participants competing in categories including Best Cosplay, Best Own Project, Best Group Presentation and Best Solo Presentation.

## 2024 Fandom Trends

According to reports from YouTube, TikTok and Spotify, fans had an outsize impact on entertainment, culture and politics in 2024, indicating the growing influence of fandom communities across social media platforms.

The search results show a vibrant Polish fantasy and gaming community centered around major conventions like Pyrkon, with strong representation in international cosplay competitions and active engagement across various media platforms in 2024.
